testcase.name: Autotrader BMW result cerification

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given open browser..........................................................undefined Then navigate to URL........................................................undefined Then Verify all the links are present.......................................undefined Then Verify Search button is present........................................undefined Then Verify Drop-Downs are present..........................................undefined Then Click on Advanced Search...............................................undefined Then User enters zipcode....................................................undefined Then User selects Certified option under Condition..........................undefined Then User selects Convertible option under Style............................undefined Then User sets the desired from and to years under Years....................undefined And User selects the make of the car under Make, Model & Trim...............undefined Then User clicks on the Search button.......................................undefined Then Assert that user only sees BMW cars....................................undefined And log total number of cars................................................undefined Then close the browser......................................................undefined
